channel.title: NPC's Fight Back?
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to make it so NPC's fight back once you hit them? I don't want them to be aggressive.. I know how to do that but I want them to actually fight back and hit you normally... Right now it hits me like every 30 seconds.. And I don't think its because of a delay.. its probably a 'default'
Thanks In Advance!
~~~~Skullator~~~~[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2008, 10:08:39 am[/size][hr]LOL Any Ideas?
